name: Memorial Day Cheesecake
author: loretta j agundez
summary: This colorful cheesecake is a perfect dessert for Memorial Day, Labor Day, or any other patriotic holiday or gathering.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package cherry-flavored gelatin (such as JELL-O®)
1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1 (12 ounce) package pound cake, cut into 12 slices
2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®), softened
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: Slice 1 cup of strawberries and halve remaining 3 cups
Pour gelatin into a heat-proof bowl and add boiling water
Stir until completely dissolved, at least 2 minutes
Pour cold water into a 2-cup measure and add enough ice cubes to bring level to 2 cups
Add cold water and ice to gelatin and stir until melted
Refrigerate until slightly thickened to the consistency of unbeaten egg whites, about 5 minutes
Meanwhile, line a 13x9-inch baking dish with sliced pound cake
Remove gelatin from the refrigerator and stir in sliced strawberries and 1 cup blueberries
Spoon mixture over cake slices in the baking dish
Beat cream cheese and sugar together in a bowl until smooth
Stir in whipped topping and spread mixture over gelatin in the baking dish
Arrange sliced strawberries and remaining blueberries to create an American flag
